attributes.action: For paramedics to treat pupils in schools for any accident if need to
attributes.background: Due to cut backs parents have take there own child ..to A and E when could been treated quicker if paramedic was present ..

rejection.details:
We're not sure what specific action your petition is asking for. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to change. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
